fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him
Nasībah bint al-Ḥārith Umm ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Nasibah bint al-Harith Umm Atiyyah al-Ansariyyah
info: She helped wash the body of Zaynab, the daughter of the Prophet ﷺ, when she died, and participated in several battles alongside the Prophet ﷺ.
8th century scholar of Qurʾānic exegisis and ḥadith
A prominent 8th century scholar and hadith narrator and brother of Ḥafṣah bint Sīrīn.

fullname: Umm al-Huthayl Ḥafṣah bint Sīrīn al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Umm al-Huthayl Hafsah bint Sirin al-Ansariyyah
info: 8th century jurist, scholar, ascetic, and sister of the famous scholar Muḥammad ibn Sīrīn

fullname: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām

info: Son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Abu al-Manāzil Khālid ibn Mahran al-Ḥithāʾ

info: Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam
